name: market for rock crushing | rock crushing | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/5273/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'rock crushing', in the Global geography.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;The service "rock crushing" represents the crushing of 1kg rock through a mechanical process. The service includes the machine, spares and wears, and lubricating oil. Electricity consumption and dust emissions are not included. Crusher throughput capacity: 454 tons per hour. A user employing this module should add the electricity consumption and input of rock, as well as further emissions if appropriate.

This activity starts with the service generation.


This activity ends with the service supplied to its consumers. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
